song.title: Scandal of Grace
song.lyrics:
[1] .G Grace, what have you done? .Em C G Murdered for me on that cross . G Accused in absence of wrong . Em C G My sin washed away in Your blood
[P1] . Bm C G Too much to make sense of it all . Bm C G I know that Your love breaks my fall . D Em The scandal of grace, You died in my place . C So my soul will live
[C] . G Oh to be like You . D Give all I have just to know You . C Jesus there's no one beside You . G C Em C Forever the Hope in my heart --- [2] .G Death, where is your sting? . Em C G Your power is as dead as my sin . G The Cross has taught me to live . Em C G And mercy, my heart now to sing
[P2] . Bm C G The day and its troubles shall come . Bm C G I know that Your strength is enough . D Em The scandal of grace, You died in my place . C So my soul will live
[B] .(F) G And it's all because of You, Jesus . D It's all because of You, Jesus . Em It's all because of Your love . C And my soul will live
